EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Dealer Update #15.2018 Dealer Update #15
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | October 2018
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​ for RM-855​ Equipped Aircraft​
- This sales bulletin provides updated pricing and product information for aircraft equipped with RM-855 radio suites. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-24 Rev C <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-24 Rev C Primus II ADS-B Out Upgrade for Business Aircraft with RM-855.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​ for RM-850​ Equipped Aircraft​
- This sales bulletin provides updated pricing and product information for aircraft equipped with RM-850 radio suites. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-30 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-30%20Rev A Primus II ADS-B Out Upgrade for Business Aircraft with RM-850.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
SmartRunway/SmartLanding 50% Discount Promotion​
- This sales bulletin provides updated STC information. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-01 Rev C <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-01 Rev C SmartRunway SmartLanding Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
